title: unknow font
content:
please help me identify the fonts on this picture, thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203825im_/http:/typophile.com/files/east_5395.jpg)
author: Fleandres

comments.content:
Perhaps this style could be called girly swirly.  
It's very difficult to create a script font with casual loopy flair and a bouncy effect. However, there are fonts with some of the flavor of this handwriting.  
Boucherie Cursive

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203825im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BoucherieCursiveAsEaster_6213.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/boucherie/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203825/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/boucherie/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/boucherie/")  
Sweetheart Script  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203825im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SweetheartScriptAsEaster_3611.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/sweetheart-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203825/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/sweetheart-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/sweetheart-script/")  
Wishes Script  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203825im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WishesScriptAsEaster_5289.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesenses/wishes-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203825/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesenses/wishes-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesenses/wishes-script/")  
Don

Also Melany Lane

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203825im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MelanyLaneAsEaster_5148.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/yellow-design/melany-lane/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203825/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/yellow-design/melany-lane/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/yellow-design/melany-lane/")  
Includes many swash and stylistic alternates 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415203825im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MelanyLaneInUse4_4557.jpg)
  
[Image excerpted from Myfonts gallery.]  
Don
